title: Spark customers New Zealand weird lag last few days?
body: Hi guys, I've been getting weird lag in my games, things just freeze up and then I jump forward 2 seconds randomly. My net is completely fine, as is my computer so I'm presuming it's my ISP, has anyone else in New Zealand been getting these issues lately?

replies.body: YES I HAVE THE SAME THING EXACTLY
YES .... YES DUDE RANDOM PACKET LOSS BUT PING STAYS THE SAME
